feature	Modal chromosomal number	 # of structurally rearanged chromosomes	Numerical complexity	Numerical heterogeneity	Fraction of normal chromosomes that experience numerical heterogeneity	Fraction of abnormal chromosomes that experience numerical heterogeneity.
